name: Criteria

unions.name: Config
unions.comment: Configuration for displaying the hierarchy of filters

unions.name: State
unions.comment:
Define if the hierarchy of filters is open and the set of the selected filters

    State False Set.empty

values.name: config
values.comment:
Create the configuation to pass in your view.

  - `title` — A string displayed for the button text
  - `toMsg` — The message which is responsible for updating the `Criteria.State` in your model
  - `toId` — A function taking a filter and returning a unique string which represent the filter
  - `tostring` — A function taking a filter and returning a string which will be used as label in the hierarchy
  - `getSubFilters` — A fuction taking a filter and returning the a list of its sub-filters
values.type: { title : String.String, toMsg : Criteria.State -> msg, toId : filter -> String.String, toString : filter -> String.String, getSubFilters : filter -> List.List filter } -> Criteria.Config msg filter

values.name: init
values.comment:
Initialise the state, ie filters are hidden and no filter selected yet

    import Criteria

    Criteria.init

values.name: selectedIdFilters
values.comment: Return the set of the selected filters' id

values.name: view
values.comment: The view function which take the configuration the state and a list of filters
values.type: Criteria.Config msg filter -> Criteria.State -> List.List filter -> Html.Html msg
